name: Point of No Return (itch) (Martin Stancek)
description:
Slovensky

Point of No Return je turn based survival adventúra odohrávajúca sa v prostredí vojnou zmietaného mesta. Tvojou úlohou je uniknúť na jeho okraj. V ceste ti stoja vojaci, tanky a najrôznejšie prekážky. Podarí sa ti utiecť?

Ovládanie: Myš (Point and Click)

English

Point of No Return is a turn-based survival adventure set in a war-torn city. Your task is to escape to its edge. Soldiers, tanks, and various obstacles stand in your way. Will you be able to escape?

Controls: Mouse (Point and Click)

Authors: Viktor Kováč｜Martin Stanček ｜ Tomáš Rybár

Music: Hey Emil
